page.text: '''Main Article''' Text with - link to articles [[Article A|To Article A]] [[Article B|To Article B]] - link to subarticles [[Article A#A-Sub 1]] - link to extern [http://www.test.com/test1] Text includes categories [[Kategorie:Main-Article|Main-Article]] == Sub 1 == Text with - link to articles [[Article C]] [[Article D]] - link to subarticles [[Article C#Sub 2]] - link to extern [http://www.test.com/test2] Text includes categories [[Kategorie:C-ArticleA]] == Sub 2 == Text === Sub 2 Sub 1 === Text === Sub 2 Sub 2 === Text ==== Sub 2 Sub 2 Sub 1 ==== Text ==== Sub 2 Sub 2 Sub 2 ==== Text ==== Sub 2 Sub 2 Sub 3 ==== Text ===== Sub 2 Sub 2 Sub 3 Sub 1 ===== Text == Sub 3 == Text with - link to extern [http://www.test.com/test1] [[Kategorie:C-ArticleB]] [[Kategorie:C-ArticleC]]
